name: @teamvortexsoftware/vortex-claude
description: Add Vortex AI integration to Claude Code in your project

scripts.prepack: echo 'This package should not be published. Use publish:stg or publish:prod' && exit 1
scripts.build:stg: pnpm run distclean && pnpm run build && mkdir -p dist.d/stg && mv dist dist.d/stg && echo && echo 'Build in ./dist.d/stg'
scripts.prepublish:stg: cp ./LICENSE ./README.md ./dist.d/stg/ && jq '.name = "@teamvortexsoftware/vortex-claude-stg" | .description = "Add Vortex AI integration to Claude Code in your project (STG)" | del(.scripts.prepack)' ./package.json > ./dist.d/stg/package.json
scripts.publish:stg: pnpm run prepublish:stg && npm publish --userconfig ../../.npmrc --access restricted ./dist.d/stg
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run distclean && pnpm run build && mkdir -p dist.d/prod && mv dist dist.d/prod && echo && echo 'Build in ./dist.d/prod'
scripts.publish:prod: pnpm run prepublish:prod && npm publish --userconfig ../../.npmrc --access public ./dist.d/prod
